title: >> Amazing Top Floor 3.5 Bed on Brighton/Brookline Line Avail Sept. 1
map_address: Mount Hood Rd near Commonwealth Ave
posting_body: Wonderful 8 room top unit in a brownstone building located just steps to Commonwealth Ave. and Whole Foods in Brighton.
Features include 3 beds with an office or study, living room, dining room, eat in kitchen with pantry, high ceilings, hardwood floors throughout and plenty of light.
Heat and hot water are included in the rent.
One parking space is available for rent.
The location is on the Brighton/Brookline line just steps to the Green Line making for an easy commute into the city and a short walk to Washington Square.
Contact Matt to schedule a showing.
Listing Agent / Landlord make no representation or warranty as to the accuracy or completeness of the information provided herein.

Prospective tenants should make their own projections, assumptions and conclusions regarding the subject properties.
